name: Peekaboo (itch)
description:
Train your memory and fast reactions in this challenging memory game featuring many cute & spooky girls.

This is the browser version of the original Android game. Online score functions will be missing. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Memorize the patterns and try to fill in the blank cards to complete the level! How many cards can you memorize in 3 seconds?

  • Fast games with increasing difficulty! Beat all 24 levels!
  • Very easy to learn but immediately challenging!
  • More than 30 monster girls cards to unlock! Zombies, mummies, demons and more!

GRAPHICS BY ILARIA/MOTOKO - https://www.facebook.com/ilariamotokoart/

MUSIC BY JPBLU - https://www.soundcloud.com/johnpetrucciblu/

FIND US ON FACEBOOK AND TWITTER - https://www.facebook.com/pimentosoapps/ - https://www.twitter.com/PimentosoGames/
